name: Arcade Football
overview: How much do you want your American Football team to score? Enough to do fractions and other Maths? That is what we're hoping for, you need to simplify this fraction for the Gipper if you want to make a first down and find the percentage of Gatorade that will be dumped on each coaches head if you have 7 coaches and 12 Gatorade cooler jugs. If you pick the wrong answer you might throw an interception or be called for off-sides and lose gridiron yards.
